#include <cstdio>
int eval(int a)
{
    int ans=0;
    while(a)
    {
	int tmp=a%10;
	ans+=tmp;
	if(tmp%2==0)
	    ans+=tmp;
	a/=10;
    }
    return ans%10;
}
int calc(int a,int b)
{
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
	ans+=eval(i);
    return ans;
}
main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
	int a,b;
	scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
	int ans=45*((b/10)-(a/10));
	ans+=calc((b/10)*10,b);
	//if (a<10)
	ans-=calc((a/10)*10,a-1);
	printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
return 0;
}
